1.name: Scar Match
1.rule: An injury inflicted upon the loser of the match in the winner's comic is now canonical and permanent. (or, if in the comic, the loser sustains multiple injuries, the winner chooses one that stays)

2.name: Duel to the Death
2.rule: Any match undertaken here will be forced into a deathmatch. The Loser dies and stays dead.  Winning a match here during round 3 also allowed the claiming of an additional tile adjacent to the match tile.

3.name: Swap Tile
3.rule:
A fighter who loses while on this tile becomes permanently swapped to the opposite team.  The fighter and artist will now fight for the other faction, and their discord presence will be retooled to reflect that.
(The winner may choose to defect)

4.name: Limiter Match
4.rule: Comics can only have a limit of 10 pages, and will be judged upon this constraint.

5.name: Super Limiter Match
5.rule: Comics can only have a limit of 2 pages, and will be judged upon this constraint.
